newsitem.title: EU: EP Fisheries Committee agenda - July 21-22.
newsitem.headline: EP Fisheries Committee agenda - July 21-22.

text.p: Committee on Fisheries [[ Monday 21 July 1997 ]] MEETING HELD IN PUBLIC 0. 1. Adoption of draft agenda (PE222.993 ) 2. Approval of minutes of meetings of: - 20-21 January 1997 (PE222.214 ) - 7 April 1997 (PE222.987 ) - 16-17 April 1997 (PE222.215 ) - 23-24 June 1997 (PE222.990 ) 3. Chairman's announcements ===] In the presence of the Commission 4. Cooperation agreement in the sea fisheries sector between the EC and the Islamic Republic of Mauritania (T05555) CNS97158 COM(97)0263 + PECH Fond - Presentation by the Commission 5. Fisheries agreement between the EC and Equatorial Guinea (T05561) ATT1539 + PECH Fond - Presentation by the Commission 6. Fisheries agreement between the EC and Cote d'Ivoire (T05560) ATT1540 + PECH Fond - Presentation by the Commission 6.1 (1) A coordinators' meeting will be held at the end of the meeting. 7. The Union's financial framework after 1999, prospects for enlargement and analysis of the EU's financial system (T05142) ATT1290 + PECH Avis A TEVERSON Robin. (ELD) F BUDG Fond R COLOM I N. (PSE) - Presentation by the Commission 8. Enlargement strategy (T05446) ATT1511 + PECH Avis A PROVAN James L. (PPE) F POLI Fond R OOSTLANDER Arie. (PPE) - Presentation by the Commission 9. Amsterdam draft treaty (T05512) ATT1535 + PECH Avis A LANGENHAGEN Brigitte (PPE) F INST Fond - - Presentation by the Commission ===] 22 July at 9 a.m. 10. 1997 report on employment situation (T05107) ATT1428 + PECH Avis A PEREZ ROYO F. (PSE) F ASOC Fond HERNANDEZ MOLLAR J. (PPE) - Exchange of views 10.0 11. Fifth EC framework research programme for research, technological development and demonstration activities (T05072) COD97119 COM(97)0142 C4-0186/97 + PECH Avis A ADAM Gordon J. (PSE) F ENER Fond R QUISTHOUDT-ROWOHL Go (PPE) (PE222.550 ) - Exchange of views 12. A framework for Community action in the field of water (T04485) **I SYN97067 COM(97)0049 C4-0192/97 + PECH Avis A d'ABOVILLE Gerard. (UPE) F ENVI Fond R WHITE Ian. (PSE) - Exchange of views 13. Consumer health and food safety (T05513) COS0563 COM(97)0183 C4-0238/97 + PECH Avis A KINDERMANN Heinz. (PSE) F ENVI Fond R PAPAYANNAKIS Mihail. (GUE) - Exchange of views 14. Food legislation (T04489) COS0556 COM(97)0176 C4-0213/97 + PECH Avis L F ENVI Fond R GRAENITZ Ilona. (PSE) - Exchange of views 15. Possibly, decision on procedure 16. Appointment of rapporteurs 16.1 Cooperation agreement in the sea fisheries sector between the EC and the Islamic Republic of Mauritania (T05555) CNS97158 COM(97)0263 + PECH Fond - Appointment of rapporteur 16.2 Fisheries agreement between the EC and Equatorial Guinea (T05561) ATT1539 + PECH Fond - Appointment of rapporteur 16.3 Fisheries agreement between the EC and Cote d'Ivoire (T05560) ATT1540 + PECH Fond - Appointment of rapporteur 16.4 Commission report on monitoring the common fisheries policy (1995) (COS0578 ) - Appointment of rapporteur 17. Appointment of draftsmen 17.1 Food legislation (T04489) COS0556 COM(97)0176 C4-0213/97 + PECH Avis L F ENVI Fond R GRAENITZ Ilona. (PSE) - Appointment of draftsman Possibly, appointment of draftsman 18. Any other business 19. Date of next meeting (in Brussels) (PE/XVII/OJ/97-12 ) - FIN - END OF DOCUMENT.
